text: @iNabmahmoud @wickedstepmami Good job. Collectively, we'll overcome whatsoever is killing people of Kano state. It's also devastating to see people washing their hands and gulping the water afterward. There should be a tv and radio advert advising against such. People should also be sensitized about Covid-19
